result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher Robin Peterson

defendant.name: Peterson, Christopher Robin
defendant.address: 430 W 6th St, c/o Goodhue County Jail, Red Wing, MN 55066

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Christopher Robin Peterson in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Defendant Christopher Robin Peterson in custody.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel informs court agreement reached, defendant will plead in 16CF01, waive P.H., State will DRI 15CF01, 56 days jail with 56 days credit, restitution request civil judgment.  Court shows WOPH, accepts Information for filing.  Court advises defendant of charge as stated in Complaint and in the Information/max. penalties; advises defendant of his constitutional rights.  Defendant pleads no contest to battery by prisoners in 16CF01.  Plea Colloquy.  Court finds defendant's WCR & Plea done K&V, accepts plea and finds defendant guilty; DRI 15CF01; sentence to 56 days in the PCJ with credit for 56 days served; enter judgment in favor of Pepin County; waive costs; provide DNA sample; advised of felony prohibitions.

Defendant Christopher Robin Peterson in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing, bound over for trial.  DA to file Information.  Arraignment scheduled for January 5, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

Defendant Christopher Robin Peterson in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Defendant Christopher Robin Peterson in custody.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State requests $2500 cash bond.  Defendant requests lower cash bond of $500.  Court sets $2500 cash bond.  Defendant waives T.L. for P.H.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for December 15, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Attorney Patrick William Waters in court.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State confirms defendant in jail in Goodhue Co., MN for FTA and on PO hold.  Warrant requested by the State.  Atty Waters requests until Friday before court issues warrant.  Court grants request.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Defendant Christopher Robin Peterson in court with attorney Patrick William Waters.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court informs defendant he needs to fingerprinted.  Waiver of time limits for P.H. cont'd.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 21, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Attorney Patrick William Waters in court.  Defendant fails to appear.  Atty Waters informs the court defendant in custody in Goodhue County.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Warrant requested by the State and authorized by the Court.

Attorney Patrick William Waters in court.  Defendant does not appear.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Waters informs the court defendant is in custody, ask a warrant not be issued.  Defendant previously appeared by phone from Goodhue County.  Adjourn.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Christopher Robin Peterson
Current: 430 W 6th St, c/o Goodhue County Jail, Red Wing, MN 55066   (Effective: 03-03-2015)
Prior: 1140 N. Oak Street, Lake City, MN

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Defendant Christopher Robin Peterson appeared by phone means. Prosecuting Atty Jon D. Seifert appeared for State of Wisconsin.    Judge advises defendant of charges/max. penalties and rights including the right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant informs the court he did not receive the complaint.  Court informs the Dist. Atty to send Mr. Peterson a copy of complaint.  Defendant in custody in Goodhue County, MN.  Court informs defendant to contact the SPD in Eau Claire at 715-836-2006.  Time limits waived for P.H.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 7, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
